94  int pin_assign = 0,
95  int parity = UART_PARITY_NONE,
96  int stop = UART_ATTR_STOP_BITS_2,
97  int width = 8){
98  uart_attr_t attr;
99  attr.baudrate = baudrate;
100  attr.pin_assign = pin_assign;
101  attr.parity = parity;
102  attr.stop = stop;
103  attr.width = width;
104  attr.start = UART_ATTR_START_BITS_1;
105  return setattr(&attr);
106  }
107 
117  int init(int baudrate = 19200,
118  int pin_assign = 0,
119  uart_parity_t parity = UART_PARITY_NONE,
120  int stop = UART_ATTR_STOP_BITS_2,
121  int width = 8){
122  if( open() < 0 ){
123  return -1;
124  }
125  return setattr(baudrate, pin_assign, parity, stop, width);
126  }
